local_intent: Execute grasp of white_plate using white_grasp: verify pose, open gripper, move above, align, attempt Pick with up to 3 retries, then verify ObjectInGripper.
assumptions: White plate is within reachable workspace
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT grasp phase: uses the computed top grasp, opens gripper, moves above and aligns, performs Pick (with retry for recovery), and verifies object secured before transfer.
